motds.title: FishBall
motds.body:
Party Game, Minigame, PvP, Teams
Go play the community made Featured Island by SD_Raymix

motds.title: Starflare
motds.body: Stars always burn bright, yet this flare shines even brighter.

messages.title: Keep Your Account Secure
messages.body: Avoid scam sites offering free V-Bucks. Epic will never ask for your password. Enable Two-Factor Authentication to help stay secure!

mac.title: Chapter 2 - Season 4 Notice
mac.body: Apple has blocked your ability to update Fortnite on the App Store, and has said they will terminate our ability to develop Fortnite for Apple devices. As a result, Chapter 2 - Season 4 (v14.00) is unavailable on your device.

androidGP.title: Chapter 2 - Season 4 Notice
androidGP.body: With the launch of Season 4, players on Google Play will be unable to play the new Season. On this platform, players can still play version v13.40.

ios.title: Chapter 2 - Season 4 Notice
ios.body: Apple has blocked your ability to update Fortnite on the App Store, and has said they will terminate our ability to develop Fortnite for Apple devices. As a result, Chapter 2 - Season 4 (v14.00) is unavailable on your device.
